channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Naked Weapon
channel.desc: When 40 young girls are kidnapped, a CIA is put in charge of the case but he does not get any leads. Later, a series of assassinations makes him suspect a connection between the cases.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Grown Ups
channel.desc: Five childhood friends take their families for a weekend trip to a lake house in their hometown, where they reunite to attend the funeral of their former high school basketball coach.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Interview
channel.desc: Aaron and Dave, who run a popular late-night show, get a chance to interview Kim Jong-un. The CIA decides to take advantage of the opportunity and devices a plan to assassinate the infamous dictator.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: The hosts, Shakti and Mukti, along with the contestants celebrate Teachers' Day by paying tribute to their gurus with their performance.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Replacement Killers
channel.desc: John Lee, a hitman, is hired to kill a cop's son. He is unable to accomplish his mission and decides to flee. However, his boss hires replacements to finish the task and kill John Lee.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dead In A Week: Or Your Money Back
channel.desc: Leslie, an elderly assassin, attempts to do some business at suicide spots. After an encounter with a struggling writer, he makes an unusual deal with him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Rescue Dawn
channel.desc: Following a crash during the Vietnam War, fighter pilot Dieter gets caught by peasants. In captivity, he hatches and executes an escape plan with five deranged prisoners only to face bigger hurdles.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Renegades
channel.desc: Four colleagues of a former Green Beret soldier decide to avenge his death by giving up their own form of justice on the lanes of London.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Sicario
channel.desc: When the war against drugs escalates at the border of the USA and Mexico, an impractical FBI agent gets commissioned by the government, where she is exposed to harsh truths.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Mask of Zorro
channel.desc: Don De la Vega sets out as the Zorro to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. During his mission, he is aided by his successor, Alejandro, who also has his own agenda.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Fury
channel.desc: Towards the end of the Second World War, Don Collier, a tank commander, is pushed to make tough decisions for the survival of his crew as they fight their way across Germany.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Fog
channel.desc: When supernatural events occur in their town, Nick and Elizabeth discover that the ghosts of a crew of sailors who were killed in a shipwreck more than 100 years ago have come to exact revenge.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Marauders
channel.desc: When Hubert National Bank is hit by a heist conducted by four thieves, an FBI Special Agent's team is called upon to investigate. Strangely, the evidence leads to the owner and his clients.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
channel.desc: A bus carrying a high school basketball team suffers a flat tyre following the kidnapping of Billy Taggar. Trouble ensues when those on board encounter the Creeper, a demonic winged creature.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: World's Greatest Dad
channel.desc: After a dramatic twist of fate, high school English teacher Lance Clayton gets a second chance to fulfil his dream of becoming a famous writer.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Knights of the Zodiac
channel.desc: Teenager Seiya makes a living fighting on the streets while searching for his kidnapped sister. However, his life changes when he taps into mystical powers he never knew he had.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Cvf
channel.desc: Six police officers investigate a murder in a suburban lodge. Their only clue is a fake address from the park register. They must solve the mystery quickly.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
channel.desc: Megan, a former police officer who works in a morgue, is tasked with moving a disfigured body. However, she sees terrifying visions that make her suspect that the corpse is possessed by a demon.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: School of Life
channel.desc: A biology teacher tries to win the Teacher of the Year award in order to continue the legacy of his father, who worked at the same school and won the title every year.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN

channel.desc: With the help of a mechanic having a tragic past, an avid player of racing video games attempts to become a professional car racer.

channel.name: And Flix IN

channel.desc: A WWII pilot is assigned a secret mission to travel with confidential documents on a Boeing B-17 Flying Fortress. However, she soon has to deal with an evil presence on board.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Awakening the Zodiac
channel.desc: After getting hold of a film reel depicting two gruesome murders, a couple approach the police to identify the killer, leading them down a dangerous path.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Uncaged
channel.desc: A sleepwalking teen attaches a camera to himself at night. Later, he finds out a dark secret about his family from the footage.

channel.name: And Flix IN

channel.desc: Alton has strange powers. His dad, Roy, takes him from a cult. The government also wants him. They all chase Roy and Alton to a destiny date.
